Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getWarnings", "()Ljava/sql/SQLWarning;", "GetGetWarningsHandler:Java.Sql.IConnectionInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Gets the first instance of any SQLWarning objects that may have been created in the use of this connection.
